author: awiner
msg: Unify proxy handling of errors, and some small improvements:
- Make servlets truly trivial by moving exception handling into ProxyBase
- Report GadgetExceptions for internal server errors as 500s, and log as warnings
- Catch illegal exceptions for incorrect "refresh" params on proxy requests and treat as 400s

author: arkurth
msg: Added condition to utils.pm::run_scp_command() to check for permission denied errors.

author: mcombellack
msg: Update the helloworld sample itest to use the correct sample artifact name

author: nslater
msg: updated NEWS and CHANGES ready for other devs
